title: Janet Yellen and other finance ministers walk out of G20 meeting as Russia speaks - NPR
content:
1. Janet Yellen and other finance ministers walk out of G20 meeting as Russia speaks  NPR
  2. US Treasury secretary and other finance ministers walk out of G20 meeting with Russia  CNN

  4. G20 finance officials walk out in protest of Russian attendance  DW (English)

description: Yellen's counterparts from the U.K. and Canada joined the walkout to protest Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
